name: [Challenge - Medium] Bicycling to Can Gio - 50% refund if complete the trip by yourself
description:
It's about a medium effort bicycle trip with about 150km from HCMC to CanGio in one day. Therefore, I would like to refund 50% trip's cost as an award to whom could complete the whole trip by bicycle (Expat only)https://triip.me/videos/vb.119186311567698/490866991066293/?type=1You may heard about Can Gio seaside, a suburban district of HCMC, where is 80km distance from District 1. It is fantastic way to get there by bicycles. Wow, a healthy trip, rewarding you with fresh seafood from a local fish market there.
The sea there is gray due to alluvium then swimming there is not a good idea. 
But on the cycling path, you can enjoy the mangroves jungle and truly fresh air. No crowded stress as D1, you will find Can Gio is totally different from other places of HCMC. And Bicycling is the best way to explore this area
